title.zh: 《孝景本紀》 Annals of the Xiaojing Emperor
title.raw: 《孝景本紀》 Annals of the Xiaojing Emperor

sentences.zh: 孝景皇帝者，孝文之中子也。

translations.text: Emperor Jing was the middle son of Emperor Wen.
His mother was Empress Dou.

sentences.zh: 孝文在代時，前后有三男，及竇太后得幸，前后死，及三子更死，故孝景得立。

translations.text: When Emperor Wen was in Dai, the empress previously had three sons, and after Empress Dou was favored, the previous empress died, and the three sons also died, therefore Emperor Jing was able to be established.

Emperor Jing was the middle son of Emperor Wen. His mother was Empress Dou. When Emperor Wen was in Dai, the empress previously had three sons, and after Empress Dou was favored, the previous empress died, and the three sons also died, therefore Emperor Jing was able to be established.
In the first year, fourth month, on the day Bingmao, pardon the world.
On the day Bisi, grant the people nobility one level.

sentences.zh: 五月，除田半租，為孝文立太宗廟。

translations.text: Fifth month, abolish half the land rent, establish the Taizong Temple for Emperor Wen.
Order the assembled ministers not to offer court congratulations.
The Xiongnu entered Dai, made peace treaty with them.

In the first year, fourth month, on the day Bingmao, pardon the world. On the day Bisi, grant the people nobility one level. Fifth month, abolish half the land rent, establish the Taizong Temple for Emperor Wen. Order the assembled ministers not to offer court congratulations. The Xiongnu entered Dai, made peace treaty with them.

sentences.zh: 二年春，封故相國蕭何孫系為武陵侯。

translations.text: Second year spring, enfeoff former Chancellor Xiao He's grandson Xi as Marquis of Wuling.
Men at twenty receive registration.
Fourth month on the day Renwu, Empress Wen died.
Guangchuan and Changsha kings all went to their fiefs.
Chancellor Shen Tu Jia died.

sentences.zh: 八月，以御史大夫開封陶青為丞相。

translations.text: Eighth month, appointed Imperial Secretary Kaifeng Tao Qing as chancellor.
Comet appeared in the northeast.

sentences.zh: 秋，衡山雨雹，大者五寸，深者二尺。

translations.text: Autumn, in Hengshan hail fell, large ones five inches, deep ones two feet.
Mars moved retrograde, guarded Beichen.
Moon appeared between Beichen.
Jupiter moved retrograde in the Heavenly Court.

sentences.zh: 置南陵及內史、祋祤為縣。

translations.text: Established Nanling and within the Interior commandery, Sheyu as counties.

Second year spring, enfeoff former Chancellor Xiao He's grandson Xi as Marquis of Wuling. Men at twenty receive registration. Fourth month on the day Renwu, Empress Wen died. Guangchuan and Changsha kings all went to their fiefs. Chancellor Shen Tu Jia died. Eighth month, appointed Imperial Secretary Kaifeng Tao Qing as chancellor. Comet appeared in the northeast. Autumn, in Hengshan hail fell, large ones five inches, deep ones two feet. Mars moved retrograde, guarded Beichen. Moon appeared between Beichen. Jupiter moved retrograde in the Heavenly Court. Established Nanling and within the Interior commandery, Sheyu as counties.
Third year first month on the day Bingji, pardon the world.
Long star appeared in the west.

sentences.zh: 天火燔雒陽東宮大殿城室。

translations.text: Heavenly fire burned Luoyang's eastern palace great hall and city rooms.

sentences.zh: 吳王濞、楚王戊、趙王遂、膠西王卬、濟南王辟光、菑川王賢、膠東王雄渠反，發兵西鄉。

translations.text: Wu King Bi, Chu King Wu, Zhao King Sui, Jiaoxi King Ang, Jinan King Pi Guang, Zichuan King Xian, Jiaodong King Xiong Qu rebelled, raised troops heading west.

sentences.zh: 天子為誅晁錯，遣袁盎諭告，不止，遂西圍梁。

translations.text: The emperor executed Chao Cuo, sent Yuan Ang to explain and warn, they did not stop, then surrounded Liang in the west.

sentences.zh: 上乃遣大將軍竇嬰、太尉周亞夫將兵誅之。

translations.text: The emperor then sent Grand General Dou Ying, Grand Commandant Zhou Yaofu to lead troops to execute them.
Sixth month on the day Binghai.

sentences.zh: 赦亡軍及楚元王子藝等與謀反者。

translations.text: Pardoned the fleeing army and Chu Yuan King's son Yi and others who conspired in rebellion.

sentences.zh: 封大將軍竇嬰為魏其侯。

translations.text: Enfeoffed Grand General Dou Ying as Marquis of Weiqi.

sentences.zh: 立楚元王子平陸侯禮為楚王。

translations.text: Established Chu Yuan King's son Pinglu Marquis Li as Chu King.

sentences.zh: 立皇子端為膠西王，子勝為中山王。

translations.text: Established imperial son Duan as Jiaoxi King, son Sheng as Zhongshan King.

sentences.zh: 徙濟北王志為菑川王，淮陽王餘為魯王，汝南王非為江都王。

translations.text: Moved Jibei King Zhi to be Zichuan King, Huaiyang King Yu to be Lu King, Runan King Fei to be Jiangdu King.
Qi King Jiang Lu, Yan King Jia both died.

Third year first month on the day Bingji, pardon the world. Long star appeared in the west. Heavenly fire burned Luoyang's eastern palace great hall and city rooms. Wu King Bi, Chu King Wu, Zhao King Sui, Jiaoxi King Ang, Jinan King Pi Guang, Zichuan King Xian, Jiaodong King Xiong Qu rebelled, raised troops heading west. The emperor executed Chao Cuo, sent Yuan Ang to explain and warn, they did not stop, then surrounded Liang in the west. The emperor then sent Grand General Dou Ying, Grand Commandant Zhou Yaofu to lead troops to execute them. Sixth month on the day Binghai. Pardoned the fleeing army and Chu Yuan King's son Yi and others who conspired in rebellion. Enfeoff Grand General Dou Ying as Marquis of Weiqi. Established Chu Yuan King's son Pinglu Marquis Li as Chu King. Established imperial son Duan as Jiaoxi King, son Sheng as Zhongshan King. Moved Jibei King Zhi to be Zichuan King, Huaiyang King Yu to be Lu King, Runan King Fei to be Jiangdu King. Qi King Jiang Lu, Yan King Jia both died.
Fourth year summer, established the crown prince.
Established imperial son Che as Jiaodong King.
Sixth month on the day Jiaxu, pardon the world.

sentences.zh: 後九月，更以（弋）［易］陽為陽陵。

translations.text: After nine months, changed Yiyang to Yangling.
Again established ferry passes, use passes to enter and exit.
Winter, made Zhao kingdom into Handan commandery.

Fourth year summer, established the crown prince. Established imperial son Che as Jiaodong King. Sixth month on the day Jiaxu, pardon the world. After nine months, changed Yiyang to Yangling. Again established ferry passes, use passes to enter and exit. Winter, made Zhao kingdom into Handan commandery.
Fifth year third month, built Yangling and Wei Bridge.

sentences.zh: 五月，募徙陽陵，予錢二十萬。

translations.text: Fifth month, recruited migrants to Yangling, gave money twenty thousand.

sentences.zh: 江都大暴風從西方來，壞城十二丈。

translations.text: Jiangdu great storm wind came from the west, destroyed city walls twelve zhang.

sentences.zh: 丁卯，封長公主子蟜為隆慮侯。

translations.text: On the day Dingmao, enfeoff eldest princess's son Dang as Marquis of Longlu.
Moved Guangchuan King to be Zhao King.

Fifth year third month, built Yangling and Wei Bridge. Fifth month, recruited migrants to Yangling, gave money twenty thousand. Jiangdu great storm wind came from the west, destroyed city walls twelve zhang. On the day Dingmao, enfeoff eldest princess's son Dang as Marquis of Longlu. Moved Guangchuan King to be Zhao King.

sentences.zh: 六年春，封中尉（趙）綰為建陵侯，江都丞相嘉為建平侯，隴西太守渾邪為平曲侯，趙丞相嘉為江陵侯，故將軍布為鄃侯。

translations.text: Sixth year spring, enfeoff Central Commandant Zhao Wan as Marquis of Jianling, Jiangdu Chancellor Jia as Marquis of Jianping, Longxi Governor Hun Ye as Marquis of Pingqu, Zhao Chancellor Jia as Marquis of Jiangling, former General Bu as Marquis of Ju.
Liang and Chu two kings both died.

sentences.zh: 後九月，伐馳道樹，殖蘭池。

translations.text: After nine months, cut down the galloping road trees, planted the orchid pond.

Sixth year spring, enfeoff Central Commandant Zhao Wan as Marquis of Jianling, Jiangdu Chancellor Jia as Marquis of Jianping, Longxi Governor Hun Ye as Marquis of Pingqu, Zhao Chancellor Jia as Marquis of Jiangling, former General Bu as Marquis of Ju. Liang and Chu two kings both died. After nine months, cut down the galloping road trees, planted the orchid pond.

sentences.zh: 七年冬，廢栗太子為臨江王。

translations.text: Seventh year winter, deposed Crown Prince Li as Linjiang King.
Eleventh month last day, eclipse of the sun.
Spring, released those serving as convicts working at Yangling.
Chancellor Qing resigned.

sentences.zh: 二月乙巳，以太尉條侯周亞夫為丞相。

translations.text: Second month on the day Biji, appointed Grand Commandant Marquis Tiao Zhou Yaofu as chancellor.

sentences.zh: 四月乙巳，立膠東王太后為皇后。

translations.text: Fourth month on the day Biji, established Jiaodong King's mother as empress.
On the day Dingsi, established Jiaodong King as crown prince.
Named Che.

Seventh year winter, deposed Crown Prince Li as Linjiang King. Eleventh month last day, eclipse of the sun. Spring, released those serving as convicts working at Yangling. Chancellor Qing resigned. Second month on the day Biji, appointed Grand Commandant Marquis Tiao Zhou Yaofu as chancellor. Fourth month on the day Biji, established Jiaodong King's mother as empress. On the day Dingsi, established Jiaodong King as crown prince. Named Che.

sentences.zh: 中元年，封故御史大夫周苛孫平為繩侯，故御史大夫周昌（子）［孫］左車為安陽侯，四月乙巳，赦天下，賜爵一級。

translations.text: Middle first year, enfeoffed former Imperial Secretary Zhou Ke's grandson Ping as Marquis of Sheng, former Imperial Secretary Zhou Chang's grandson Zuo Che as Marquis of Anyang, fourth month on the day Biji, pardon the world, grant nobility one level.
Abolished prohibitions and restrictions.
Earthquake.

sentences.zh: 衡山、原都雨雹，大者尺八寸。

translations.text: Hengshan, Yuandu hail fell, large ones one chi eight inches.

Middle first year, enfeoff former Imperial Secretary Zhou Ke's grandson Ping as Marquis of Sheng, former Imperial Secretary Zhou Chang's grandson Zuo Che as Marquis of Anyang, fourth month on the day Biji, pardon the world, grant nobility one level. Abolished prohibitions and restrictions. Earthquake. Hengshan, Yuandu hail fell, large ones one chi eight inches.

sentences.zh: 中二年二月，匈奴入燕，遂不和親。

translations.text: Middle second year second month, Xiongnu entered Yan, then did not make peace treaty.
Third month, summoned Linjiang King to come.
He died in the Central Commandant's office.

sentences.zh: 夏，立皇子越為廣川王，子寄為膠東王。

translations.text: Summer, established imperial son Yue as Guangchuan King, son Ji as Jiaodong King.
Enfeoffed four marquises.
Ninth month on the day Jiaxu, eclipse of the sun.

Middle second year second month, Xiongnu entered Yan, then did not make peace treaty. Third month, summoned Linjiang King to come. He died in the Central Commandant's office. Summer, established imperial son Yue as Guangchuan King, son Ji as Jiaodong King. Enfeoffed four marquises. Ninth month on the day Jiaxu, eclipse of the sun.

sentences.zh: 中三年冬，罷諸侯御史中丞。

translations.text: Middle third year winter, abolished the feudal lords' imperial secretaries.

sentences.zh: 春，匈奴王二人率其徒來降，皆封為列侯。

translations.text: Spring, two Xiongnu kings led their followers to surrender, all enfeoffed as marquises.
Middle third year winter, abolished the feudal lords' imperial secretaries. Spring, two Xiongnu kings led their followers to surrender, all enfeoffed as marquises.
Middle fourth year third month, established Deyang Palace.
Great locusts.
Autumn, pardoned convicts working at Yangling.
Middle fourth year third month, established Deyang Palace. Great locusts. Autumn, pardoned convicts working at Yangling.

sentences.zh: 中五年夏，立皇子舜為常山王。

translations.text: Middle fifth year summer, established imperial son Shun as Changshan King.
Enfeoffed ten marquises.

sentences.zh: 六月丁巳，赦天下，賜爵一級。

translations.text: Sixth month on the day Dingji, pardon the world, grant nobility one level.
World great floods.
Changed the name of feudal lords' chancellors to 'chancellor'.
Autumn, earthquake.

Middle fifth year summer, established imperial son Shun as Changshan King. Enfeoffed ten marquises. Sixth month on the day Dingji, pardon the world, grant nobility one level. World great floods. Changed the name of feudal lords' chancellors to 'chancellor'. Autumn, earthquake.

sentences.zh: 中六年二月己卯，行幸雍，郊見五帝。

translations.text: Middle sixth year second month on the day Jimao, traveled to Yong, offered sacrifices seeing the five emperors.
Third month, hail fell.

sentences.zh: 四月，梁孝王、城陽共王、汝南王皆薨。

translations.text: Fourth month, Liang Xiaowang, Chengyang Gongwang, Runan Wang all died.

sentences.zh: 立梁孝王子明為濟川王，子彭離為濟東王，子定為山陽王，子不識為濟陰王。

translations.text: Established Liang Xiaowang's son Ming as Jichuan King, son Peng Li as Jidong King, son Ding as Shanyang King, son Bu Shi as Ji Yin King.
Liang divided into five.
Enfeoffed four marquises.

sentences.zh: 更命廷尉為大理，將作少府為將作大匠，主爵中尉為都尉，長信詹事為長信少府，將行為大長秋，大行為行人，奉常為太常，典客為大行，治粟內史為大農。

translations.text: Changed name of Court Judge to Grand Judge, Construction Foreman to Construction Grand Artisan, Chief of Nobility Commandant to Chief Commandant, Longxin Supervisor of Household to Longxin Junior Steward, Director of the Imperial Household to Grand Chamberlain of the Imperial Household, Grand Usher to Usher, Reverent Constant to Grand Constant, Protocol Secretary to Grand Protocol, Grain Intendant to Grand Farmer.

sentences.zh: 以大內為二千石，置左右內官，屬大內。

translations.text: Made the Grand Interior two thousand shi, established left and right interior officials, belonging to the Grand Interior.
Seventh month on the day Xinhai, eclipse of the sun.
Eighth month, Xiongnu entered Shangjun.

Middle sixth year second month on the day Jimao, traveled to Yong, offered sacrifices seeing the five emperors. Third month, hail fell. Fourth month, Liang Xiaowang, Chengyang Gongwang, Runan Wang all died. Established Liang Xiaowang's son Ming as Jichuan King, son Peng Li as Jidong King, son Ding as Shanyang King, son Bu Shi as Ji Yin King. Liang divided into five. Enfeoffed four marquises. Changed name of Court Judge to Grand Judge, Construction Foreman to Construction Grand Artisan, Chief of Nobility Commandant to Chief Commandant, Longxin Supervisor of Household to Longxin Junior Steward, Director of the Imperial Household to Grand Chamberlain of the Imperial Household, Grand Usher to Usher, Reverent Constant to Grand Constant, Protocol Secretary to Grand Protocol, Grain Intendant to Grand Farmer. Made the Grand Interior two thousand shi, established left and right interior officials, belonging to the Grand Interior. Seventh month on the day Xinhai, eclipse of the sun. Eighth month, Xiongnu entered Shangjun.

sentences.zh: 後元年冬，更命中大夫令為衛尉。

translations.text: Later first year winter, changed name of central palace guard commander to Guard Commander.

sentences.zh: 三月丁酉，赦天下，賜爵一級，中二千石、諸侯相爵右庶長。

translations.text: Third month on the day Dingyou, pardon the world, grant nobility one level, central two thousand shi, feudal lords' chancellors nobility right grandee.
Fourth month, great feast.

sentences.zh: 五月丙戌，地動，其蚤食時復動。

translations.text: Fifth month on the day Bingxu, earthquake, at the time of early meal again shook.

sentences.zh: 上庸地動二十二日，壞城垣。

translations.text: Shangyong earthquake twenty-two days, destroyed city walls.
Seventh month on the day Yiji, eclipse of the sun.
Chancellor Liu She resigned.

sentences.zh: 八月壬辰，以御史大夫綰為丞相，封建陵侯。

translations.text: Eighth month on the day Renchen, appointed Imperial Secretary Wan as chancellor, enfeoffed as Marquis of Jianling.

Later first year winter, changed name of central palace guard commander to Guard Commander. Third month on the day Dingyou, pardon the world, grant nobility one level, central two thousand shi, feudal lords' chancellors nobility right grandee. Fourth month, great feast. Fifth month on the day Bingxu, earthquake, at the time of early meal again shook. Shangyong earthquake twenty-two days, destroyed city walls. Seventh month on the day Yiji, eclipse of the sun. Chancellor Liu She resigned. Eighth month on the day Renchen, appointed Imperial Secretary Wan as chancellor, enfeoffed as Marquis of Jianling.

sentences.zh: 後二年正月，地一日三動。

translations.text: Later second year first month, earth shook three times in one day.
General Zhi attacked the Xiongnu.
Feast five days.

sentences.zh: 令內史郡不得食馬粟，沒入縣官。

translations.text: Ordered interior commanderies not to feed horses grain, confiscate to county officials.
Ordered convicts to wear seven-span cloth.
Stopped horse pounding.

sentences.zh: 為歲不登，禁天下食不造歲。

translations.text: Because the year harvest was poor, prohibited the world from eating unfashionable food.
Reduced the marquises sent to their fiefs.
Third month, Xiongnu entered Yanmen.
Tenth month, rented Changling fields.
Great drought.

sentences.zh: 衡山國、河東、雲中郡民疫。

translations.text: Hengshan kingdom, Hedong, Yunzhong commandery people epidemic.

Later second year first month, earth shook three times in one day. General Zhi attacked the Xiongnu. Feast five days. Ordered interior commanderies not to feed horses grain, confiscate to county officials. Ordered convicts to wear seven-span cloth. Stopped horse pounding. Because the year harvest was poor, prohibited the world from eating unfashionable food. Reduced the marquises sent to their fiefs. Third month, Xiongnu entered Yanmen. Tenth month, rented Changling fields. Great drought. Hengshan kingdom, Hedong, Yunzhong commandery people epidemic.

sentences.zh: 後三年十月，日月皆（食）赤五日。

translations.text: Later third year tenth month, sun and moon both appeared red five days.
Twelfth month last day, thunder.
Sun appeared purple.
Five stars moved retrograde guarding Taiwei.
Moon passed through the heavenly court center.
First month on the day Jiazi, crown prince capped.
On the day Jiazi, Emperor Jing died.

sentences.zh: 遺詔賜諸侯王以下至民為父後爵一級，天下戶百錢。

translations.text: Testament granted feudal lords and kings below to people who become heirs nobility one level, world households one hundred cash.

sentences.zh: 出宮人歸其家，復無所與。

translations.text: Sent out palace people to return to their homes, pardoned without giving anything.

sentences.zh: 太子即位，是為孝武皇帝。

translations.text: Crown prince ascended the throne, this was Emperor Wu.

sentences.zh: 三月，封皇太后弟蚡為武安侯，弟勝為周陽侯。

translations.text: Third month, enfeoffed Empress Dowager's younger brother Fen as Marquis of Wuan, younger brother Sheng as Marquis of Zhouyang.
Established Yangling.

Later third year tenth month, sun and moon both appeared red five days. Twelfth month last day, thunder. Sun appeared purple. Five stars moved retrograde guarding Taiwei. Moon passed through the heavenly court center. First month on the day Jiazi, crown prince capped. On the day Jiazi, Emperor Jing died. Testament granted feudal lords and kings below to people who become heirs nobility one level, world households one hundred cash. Sent out palace people to return to their homes, pardoned without giving anything. Crown prince ascended the throne, this was Emperor Wu. Third month, enfeoffed Empress Dowager's younger brother Fen as Marquis of Wuan, younger brother Sheng as Marquis of Zhouyang. Established Yangling.

sentences.zh: 太史公曰：漢興，孝文施大德，天下懷安，至孝景，不復憂異姓，而晁錯刻削諸侯，遂使七國俱起，合從而西鄉，以諸侯太盛，而錯為之不以漸也。

translations.text: The Grand Historian says: Han arose, Emperor Wen applied great virtue, the world felt peaceful, to Emperor Jing, no longer worried about different surnames, yet Chao Cuo cut and reduced the feudal lords, thus caused seven kingdoms to rise together, allied and headed west, because the feudal lords were too powerful, and Cuo did it not gradually.

sentences.zh: 及主父偃言之，而諸侯以弱，卒以安。

translations.text: When Zhu Fu Yan spoke of it, the feudal lords weakened, finally became peaceful.
The mechanism of safety and danger, how can it not be due to planning?

The Grand Historian says: Han arose, Emperor Wen applied great virtue, the world felt peaceful, to Emperor Jing, no longer worried about different surnames, yet Chao Cuo cut and reduced the feudal lords, thus caused seven kingdoms to rise together, allied and headed west, because the feudal lords were too powerful, and Cuo did it not gradually. When Zhu Fu Yan spoke of it, the feudal lords weakened, finally became peaceful. The mechanism of safety and danger, how can it not be due to planning?
